name: Please Be Seated!
description:
You are a struggling young actor who just landed his first ever gig - playing a part in a new TV show!

You have invited all of your friends for a screening party, so that they can congratulate you on your big role (and perhaps lend you some money until you get your big TV actor paycheck...)

What you didn't expect though, is that every single one of them would actually come! 

You only have a limited space in your living room, so only a couple of your friends can watch at a time... but you would really like that loan from more than just a couple of people...

In order to succeed, you need to keep all of your friends happy, by accommodating their preferances, and then kick them out so that the next person gets a spot in your living room and gets to see what an aspiring young actor you are (and how certian they can be that their loan will be repaid once you land a bigger role... hence why they need to see this episode you are starring in!)
